sentence.Network_en: The prototype construction meaning throws light on the ambiguity of weak extro - orientational verbs, exocentric verbs.
sentence.Network_cn: 由于原型句式语义的影响,使弱外向动词和离心动词构成的双宾句形成歧义.

sentence.Network_en: When & quot ; until last Easter & quot ; serves as an adverb it is an exocentric construction.
sentence.Network_cn: 当“直到上一个复活节 ” 用作副词时,它是一种外向结构.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 正英语复合人称名词从结构成份和词义之间的关系来看,有内向的(endocentric)和外向的(exocentric)两类。所谓内向的复合人称名词,简单地说,就是结构成份中含有指.
